definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: At last, it obducted and thrusted to outcrop on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 後期又由於仰衝推覆，最終出露地表。

sentences.english: The percentage of soil moisture content and surface residual coverage jointly influence the quantity of wind erosion.
sentences.chinese: 土壤含水率和地表殘茬覆蓋共同影響着土壤的風蝕量。

sentences.english: Therefore, it made water body in the ci…
sentences.chinese: 合理利用地表水體的自淨作用。

sentences.english: Some might still be locked in aquifers and other form. ations beneath the surface.
sentences.chinese: 有些水也許還被鎖在蓄水層和其它地表以下的構造中。

sentences.english: Influence of the terrestrial heat flow on the evolution of the surface ecosystem and environment.
sentences.chinese: 試論大地熱流對地表環境與生態演變的影響。
污染物質能使地表水酸化。

sentences.english: With the technics of purdah infusion to stem water, surface sinking of large area can be prevented.
sentences.chinese: 採用帷幕注漿堵水工藝可防止大面積地表塌陷的發生。

sentences.english: The slope mine under the town was slowly filled with salt brine making the surface subside.
sentences.chinese: 小鎮下方的傾斜巷道慢慢被鹽水充滿以致地表下沉。

sentences.english: The runoff has the catabatic effect to acidification of water quality.
sentences.chinese: 地表徑流對水質的酸化有緩衝作用。

sentences.english: The ground subsidence was due to collapse of loess soil caused by applying irrigation water.
sentences.chinese: 地表沉陷是由灌溉水的充填引起黃土結構崩塌造成的。

sentences.english: Rebuilding near-surface velocity field is very important for calculating statics.
sentences.chinese: 近地表速度場的重建是獲得準確靜校正量的關鍵。

sentences.english: The climate is also much affected by the inclination of the earth's surface and its altitude above sea level.
sentences.chinese: 氣候受地表傾斜程度及其海撥高度的影響也很大。

sentences.english: It saturates the atmosphere, covers the Earth's surface and wheedles its way into bedrock cracks.
sentences.chinese: 它充塞大氣，覆蓋地表，還巧妙地進入了石牀的縫隙。

sentences.english: Volcanic rocks from inside the field were found to be non-magnetic.
sentences.chinese: 在地表內的火山岩被發現是非磁性的。

sentences.english: The ground is covered with moraine.
Branches and Roots, are Image Symmetrical to Earth.
sentences.chinese: 樹木的乾枝，要和根鬚，相對地表鏡像對稱的。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
